chapters.title: Chapter 5: A Tale of Blood
chapters.info: Corele Hovian, p. 98—Boyishly slim yet pretty Aes Sedai of the Yellow Ajah. She has thick black eyebrows, blue eyes, and wild, raven-black hair. She always dresses as if she is going to a country dance, and wears a perpetual smile. She is now one of Cadsuane's companions. She has bonded Damer Flinn as her Warder. She grew up in Murandy. She stubbornly refuses to acknowledge Nynaeve as an Aes Sedai.
